plot: A phony Tibetan lama-for-hire cons his way into the wealthy home of a grieving couple, and hope for each lies in transcending their roles.
title: My Mandala
plot_es: A phony Tibetan lama-for-hire cons his way into the wealthy home of a grieving couple, and hope for each lies in transcending their roles.
plot_en: A phony Tibetan lama-for-hire cons his way into the wealthy home of a grieving couple, and hope for each lies in transcending their roles.
